item.title: Code
item.description: My Projects This page lists some of the software projects that I've worked on. My GitLab profile contains the source code for most of these projects, as well as plenty of odds and ends that I didn't think were interesting enough to go here. Sabre A Sparse Voxel Octree voxel renderer written for my University Final Year project. Written in C++ and using modern OpenGL. The software can import and voxelise GLTF mesh files to a high level of detail.
